Hello World

January 07, 2019 Monday by Girish Godage
Personal

Hello everyone, I am Girish. I am an 46-year-old guy, who has a good command in technology & Management.I worked on .net,java, Python, Web and Mobile Application. This website is created using Jekyll. I love to create new stuff from the knowledge I have. You can follow me on my Github to see my current projects.

If you want to know more about me, you can simply contact me using different social media platforms.

Thankyou for reading this blog❤.
